snippet: The Monterey formation in Southern California is partially composed of oil and gas-rich shale plays, areas considered promising for production. As hydraulic fracturing operations expand in the region, the number of wells dotting the landscape may...
lead_paragraph: The Monterey formation in Southern California is partially composed of oil and gas-rich shale plays, areas considered promising for production. As hydraulic fracturing operations expand in the region, the number of wells dotting the landscape may grow from a few hundred to a few thousand.
